mapper.insert: insert into sample_backup ( id, name, type, number, long_number, double_number, big_decimal, sql_date, util_date, timestamp, local_date_time, local_date, lob_text, crypto_text ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{number}, #{longNumber}, #{doubleNumber}, #{bigDecimal}, #{sqlDate}, #{utilDate}, #{timestamp}, #{localDateTime}, #{localDate}, #{lobText}, #{cryptoText} )
